doc:
Update an aggregate
```````````````````

Updates an individual aggregate's attributes.  Only the attributes
submitted are modified.

Attributes:

- ``status``: ``"resolved"``, ``"unresolved"``, ``"muted"``
- ``hasSeen``: `true`, false`
- ``isBookmarked``: `true`, false`
- ``assignedTo``: user id
title: Update an aggregate
